name: 2020 Mission
description:
- CONTROLS -
WASD or ARROWS to move/aim/go prone
K or Z or SPACE to jump
J or X to fire
------------------------
GameMaker 20 Jam
Theme - 20
------------------------
A mini run 'n' gun with a 20x20 resolution aesthetic (it's scaled up to 200x200 for smoother movement).

Made in 3 days.
I had to cut the boss fight and the music was rushed in the last half hour before the deadline, but it's "finished enough" for now :)
------------------------

Thanks for playing!
